text: Diane Kruger. Anaele Pelisson, Business Insider ; Getty German actress Diane Kruger has built an impressive career, but after working steadily for 16 years, her new movie is getting her recognition she never thought she'd ever receive. On Sunday, ` ` In the Fade'' ( now playing in theaters ) won the Golden Globe for best foreign language film. From German filmmaker Fatih Akin, it's highlighted by Kruger's tour - de - force performance.
